00043 /// IKOR Test Control System
00044 /**
00045  * Excersices the IKORController on various inputs, with various
00046  *  optimization criteria and constraints according to specification
00047  *  in a closed-loop (without any dynamic robot simulation)
00048  */
00049 class IKORTestControlSystem : public base::ReferencedObject, public base::Externalizable
00050 {
00051 public:
00052   IKORTestControlSystem();
00053 
00054   virtual String className() const { return String("IKORTestControlSystem"); }
00055 
00056   // Externalizable
00057   virtual bool formatSupported(const String format, Real version = 1.0, ExternalizationType type = IO) const = 0; ///< query if specific format is supported (for input, output or both)
00058   virtual void externalize(Externalizer& e, const String format = "", Real version = 1.0) = 0; ///< read or write object state to Externalizer
00059 
00060 protected:
00061 
00062 };
00063 
00064 
00065 }
00066 }
